entry.title: Thursday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 7:21 PM CST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of light snow. High minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow and risk of freezing drizzle. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 7:21 PM CST Thursday 19 January 2023
